sources.full: Ruxzy's Guide to Vasstika and its Inhabitants

trait.name: Fear Frenzy
entries: The Sigmauler has advantage on attack rolls made against {@condition frightened} creatures.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The Sigmauler has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, sound, or smell.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the Sigmauler has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Demiplane Denizen
entries: As a bonus action, the Sigmauler can magically shift from its current location on the Primary Plane to its equivalent location on its Demiplane, or vice versa.

trait.name: Venomous
entries: This monster's melee attacks give their targets stacks of Venom. Upon reaching 3 stacks of Venom, the creature is {@condition paralyzed} until the start of the Sigmauler's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Sigmauler makes a Bite attack and a Claw attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it makes a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 12 ({@damage 4d4}) necrotic damage and gaining 1 stack of Venom on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it makes a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 12 ({@damage 4d4}) necrotic damage and gaining 2 stacks of Venom on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The Sigmauler regains HP equal to the necrotic damage dealt by this attack.

action.name: Tail Swipe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, 5 ft. cone. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it makes a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 12 ({@damage 4d4}) necrotic damage and gaining 1 stack of Venom on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Teleport {@recharge 4}
entries: The Sigmauler magically teleports. It disappears from its current location is a flash of sickly yellow, then reappears up to 40 ft. away, making up to one Bite or Tail Swipe attack.
